command.help:
Usage: help nameOfACommand
Shows help for the application.

Usage: commonality [nameOfAFeature]
commonality calculates the commonality of a feature. In other words, the number of products of the model in that this feature appears.

Usage: core-features
core-features returns features that are present in every product.

Usage: errors
errors looks for decisions that cause errors on the model. When errors are found, this command provides an option to explain them.

Usage: exit
Command used to exit application.

Usage: load pathToAModel
This command loads a model from a file. You should invoke it before do any operation.

Usage: #products
#products returns the number of products of a feature model.

Usage: products
It returns a list with every product of the feature model.

Usage: valid-product [list of features]
It calculates if a given product (a set of features) is valid for the current model. If the product is not valid, this operation provides an option to show changes to turn the product into a valid one.

Usage: valid
This operation calculates if the current model is valid. A model is valid when it has, at leats, one product. If the model is not valid, the operation provides options to analyse and explain errors caused it.

Usage: variability
Operation that calculates variability degree of the model.

Usage: variant-features
It returns set of features that are not present on every product.
